betafeatures-auto-enroll-help: Bita aŋa la asi'a ni tara teere n ni dɛna pakerɛ bala la{{GENDER:|you}} nari ti la tee ze'ele bo sansɛka
betafeatures-desc: Basɛ ti tuntuna iŋɛ bii da iŋɛ naanɛ duma la n boi wiki dee nan ka maasum ti ba iŋɛ "prime-time"
betafeatures-section-desc: Lalam {{PLURAL:$1|is a new feature|are some new features}} tu ti'iserı ti tu tee la{{SITENAME}}. Zaam zaam kpeŋe fumiŋa iŋɛ dina wa{{PLURAL:$1|it|them}} gee yele tu fu puti'irɛ n de sɛla, la wan iŋɛ se'em ti tu tole nɛŋa {{PLURAL:$1|it|them}} yɛsera fu lebesego la puan.
mw-ui-feature-requirements-betafeatures: Naankuna wa n boti sɛla n ŋwana{{PLURAL:$1|feature|features}} ti la ta'am yu'e
mw-ui-feature-requirements-browser: Yele ana wa {{PLURAL:$1|browser is|browsers are}} ka tuni:
mw-ui-feature-requirements-skins: Naadina wa$1 kɔ'ɔm tuna mɛ la {{PLURAL:$1 ma'an| "skin" sɛka n doli la|"skins" sɛba n doli la}}:
mw-ui-feature-user-count: {{PLURAL:$1|tuntuna ayina de la|$1 tuntuneba de la |0=Bo tuntuneba de la}} mɔɔra la naanɛ wa.
prefs-description-betafeatures: Tɛɛsum yele paala si'a ti tu nan ita wa gee bo tu fu lebesego
